ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then you, you misguided, you deniers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then you, the erring and the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then you, the erring ones and those that gave the lie to the Truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then you people who had gone astray and rejected the Truth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then indeed you, the astray, the deniers –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then verily, --- you the erring -- ones, the deniers!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then shall you, O you who err and call it a lie!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then you erring ones, you that cried lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! ye, the erring, the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then you, you misguided ones, who deny the truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily ye, O ye erring, denying people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then will ye truly,- O ye that go wrong, and treat (Truth) as Falsehood!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then moreover, verily, you the erring-ones, the deniers (of Resurrection)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then you went astray, you that belied,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then you, you misguided, who deny the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:51] Then indeed you, the erring, the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then lo! ye, the erring) from faith and guidance, (the deniers) of Allah, His Messenger and Scripture. This refers to Abu Jahl and his host,
